about.title: 事項紹介
about.line1: Hi, I'm a freelance web developer specialising in high quality complex web solutions for small - medium businesses..
about.line2: I have experience building enterprise grade web applicagtions at JP Morgan, one of the largest banks in the world and a degree in software development for business (in progress).
about.line3: My aim is to use my services to build specialised solutions for the complex needs of modern businesses to help people thrive on the web.
about.line4: I can make you a well designed intuitive and proffesional web presence to allow you to do anything from ecommerce to blogs and everything in between to help grow your business.
about.progress: 卒業するまで(フリランスは仕事になるまで)
